name: contamination.Chernarus
tagline: Radioactive Wasteland Mission Template for Arma 2.
body:
### Welcome to New Chernarus
This mission template converts the idyllic landscapes of Chernarus to a radioactive wasteland.  Fight to survive, hunt animals to eat, and most importantly, try not to get killed by radiation sickness.

### Authors and Contributors
The creator of `contamination.Chernarus` is John Ankarstr√∂m, also known as @jocap and JohnAJ.  The project started in February, 2014.

**Want to contribute?**  Great!  We're looking for you.  Clone this repository (the Windows GitHub client is recommended) and submit your pull requests.

### Report Bugs
You can look at old issues and create new ones under [Issues](https://github.com/jocap/contamination.Chernarus/issues).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
